message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30. It's best to settle this quickly before inflation eats away at your share.
Your offer was unfair. Let's be reasonable, I'll take 60 and you take 40. The longer this goes on, the less we both get.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  Let's be realistic - I'm offering you $35. That's more than you'd get if you wait any longer!
Alice, we're running out of time! This is my final offer. 55 for me, 45 for you.  Take it before inflation makes this whole thing pointless.
